sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen mǎi le yīxiē xīn jiājù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons acheté de nouveaux meubles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We bought some new furniture.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez signer le contrat.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sign the contract.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre est très épais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book is very thick.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个小区有五百户人家。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiǎoqū yǒu wǔbǎi hù rénjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce quartier compte cinq cents ménages.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This community has five hundred households.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'infirmière prend soin du patient.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The nurse is taking care of the patient.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me souviens avec nostalgie de mes années universitaires.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I miss my university days very much.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nà duì fūfù jiéhūn shí nián le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce couple est marié depuis dix ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That couple has been married for ten years.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait du bateau sur le lac.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is rowing a boat on the lake.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Leur mariage était très romantique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Their wedding was very romantic.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yào kěyǐ huǎnjiě téngtòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce médicament peut soulager la douleur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This medicine can relieve pain.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce groupe de personnes est suspect.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This group of people is suspicious.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le prix de l'or a augmenté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The price of gold has risen.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime manger de la salade de concombre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to eat cucumber salad.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè pī huò yǐjīng dào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce lot de marchandises est déjà arrivé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This batch of goods has already arrived.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì wǒ de hǎo huǒbàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est mon bon partenaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is my good partner.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你喜欢什么类型的电影？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuan shénme lèixíng de diànyǐng?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel genre de film aimes-tu ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What type of movies do you like?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait de l'exercice presque tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He exercises almost every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 听到这个消息，我非常激动。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi, wǒ fēicháng jīdòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En entendant cette nouvelle, j'étais très ému.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I was very excited to hear this news.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son film a remporté un prix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His movie won an award.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un malentendu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a misunderstanding.
